segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and spot the woman by the sink first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate, totally zoned in on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running, but that's not the shocking part.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the sink is overflowing massively!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is sheet ing down the front, hitting the floor hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed her shoe is wetâ€”unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, a boy is on a stool, arm deep in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whoa, that stool is leaning way back, about to topple!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is reaching up, in on the cookie caper.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a calm garden, which surprises me amid this frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such hidden dangers in this ordinary setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between outside peace and inside havoc is startling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene just keeps revealing more unexpected elements.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long until it all catches up with them.
segments.speaker: PAR
